main.usecases

Class MessageManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.usecases.MessageManager

  • public class MessageManager
extends java.lang.Object
    MessageManager stores all the messages and assigns an ID to each Message
    Since:
    2020-11-03
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Steven Yuan, David Zhao
